sentences.en: ' steel in this class is tough, ductile and easily machined. "
sentences.cn: 这种钢强韧, 延展性好,而且容易加工.

sentences.en: Artists use copper because it's one of the most ductile metals.
sentences.cn: 艺术家们使用铜作材料,是因为铜是延展性最好的金属之一.

sentences.en: Basic structures have Xiyoufang thrusting - nappe ductile shear zone and Jiangjiashan overfault.

sentences.en: Characteristically, metals are opaque, ductile, and good conductors of heat and electricity.
sentences.cn: 从特点来看, 金属不透明, 有韧性, 是热和电的良导体.

sentences.en: Ductile - brittle transition mechanism is discussed concerning machining parameters and material property.
sentences.cn: 通过讨论加工参数和材料特性来研究脆塑性转换机理.

sentences.en: In Petroleum, chemical and Marine applications, Ductile Iron Does it!
sentences.cn: 在石油 、 化工和海运领域, 球墨铸铁发挥着非凡的作用!

sentences.en: In turn, this prevents issues concerning corrosion, as the ductile material doesn't crack.
sentences.cn: 因此，这也避免了一些腐蚀性问题，比如一些可延展的材料不易开裂。

sentences.en: Materials: Grey Iron, Ductile Iron, wear and heat resistant alloy iron.
sentences.cn: 材质包括: 灰铁 、 球铁 、 耐磨、耐热合金铸铁.

sentences.en: Shrinkage and dispersed shrinkage are the special waster of ductile iron.
sentences.cn: 缩孔和缩松是球墨铸铁特有的废品现象.

sentences.en: The main ore - controlling structure is Zaiziwan brittle - ductile shear zone.
sentences.cn: 主控矿构造为寨子湾韧-脆性剪切构造带.

sentences.en: The metal is very hard and strong and less ductile than before.
sentences.cn: 金属会非常坚硬、坚固,并比以前减少了韧性.

sentences.en: The Yanshanian ductile shearing resulted in further enrichment of gold and antimony.
sentences.cn: 燕山期叠加的脆性变形使金锑矿进一步富集.

sentences.en: Trial producing a austempering ductile iron of oblique wedge to replace steel.
sentences.cn: 试制一种新型的奥氏体──贝氏体球铁斜楔,代替原来的铸钢件.

sentences.en: Whereas the alloy with low Na content exhibited ductile fracture with dimples.
sentences.cn: 而钠含量较高的合金发生韧性断裂,断口为韧窝型.
